title: can't download league (x64) windows 10
body: i've never had an issue before but i just bought a new laptop, and when i try to download i get an error 1935 idk what to do..

replies.body:
Error 1935 usually indicates that there's an issue with the Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 libraries on your computer. You should be able to resolve this by running _all available windows updates_ and reinstalling C++ using [**this package**](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387) from Microsoft.

Let me know if this worked for you. ^.^
